title: My Profile
onlyImage: You can only upload image files!
consentForAIAnalysis: I consent to AI analysis of my medical data

healthReminders.title: Health Reminders
healthReminders.fluVaccineDueDesc: Your annual flu vaccine is recommended. Schedule an appointment today.
healthReminders.healthCheckupDesc: It's time for your routine health checkup. Book your appointment now.
healthReminders.vaccinationRecordCompleteDesc: All your vaccinations are up to date. Keep up the good health!
healthReminders.healthTip1: Stay hydrated - drink at least 8 glasses of water daily
healthReminders.healthTip2: Get regular exercise - at least 30 minutes a day
healthReminders.healthTip3: Maintain a balanced diet with fruits and vegetables
healthReminders.healthTip4: Get enough sleep - 7-8 hours per night for optimal health

security.title: Security Settings
security.accountSecureDesc: Your account has strong security settings enabled
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
security.passwordUpdateFailed: Failed to update password. Please check your current password.
security.passwordMismatch: New password and confirm password do not match
security.unexpectedError: An error occurred while updating password

completeProfile.title: Complete Your Health Profile
completeProfile.subtitle: We need a few more details to set up your secure <bold>Digital Medicine Card</bold> and ensure accurate vaccination records.
completeProfile.identityNumberTooltip: For children under 14, please use the Personal ID Code found on the Birth Certificate.
completeProfile.identityNumberInvalid: Please enter a valid identity number!
completeProfile.phoneNumberInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number!
completeProfile.termsText: By clicking the button, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
completeProfile.successMessage: Health profile completed! You can now book your vaccinations.
completeProfile.errorMessage: An error occurred while completing profile

validation.birthdayRequired: Please select your date of birth!
validation.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old
